title: PermaBan Reformed
body: Sadly I was banned six months ago. I was on my last strike and I got tilted by a troll. I procceded to call him trash...I regret it so much. Now I play on my second account. I control my tilt now. I usually just meme in the chat or not say anything at all. I even climbed up to S3. Wow who knew I would be a better player if I controlled my tilt...oh wait Rito did. Im completly changed now. Ima higher rank and honor level 2 step 2. Im thinking about asking rito one last time to reconsider and to maybe lift the ban when the new season starts. Ofc after I give them a true apology that comes from the heart. Ill even somehow prove to them that I have changed. Heck Ill do 40 hours of community service and somehow prove it to them. I think itll be nice to start again in season 9 to start a new slate. What do you guys think?

They did do something like that in the summer but they didn't say anything about it ever since and they discontinued it. Most likely didn't go well. Maybe next time they do an experiment like that you can get in and try getting unbanned.
You can start on a new slate with a new account.
Before they did an experiment with giving permad players another chance, maybe they'll do it again, maybe not.

Permaban as the name suggests, is permanent. They don't lift permabans unless it is a 100% false positive, which in your case probably isn't since you admitted your wrongs. Keep it going on your new acc.
Be careful relating your rank to your new reformed attitude. Eventually youre gonna hit a loss streak and demote and then what are you going to say? Lol. Ranked is a fickle bitch.

Personally, I'm for giving people chances to show reform on a 2nd account + community service. 

But I'm not in charge of policies here.
